name: Huntober
description: The goal of the game is to survive as long as possible! Huntober was made in one month for Devtober 2018! Not everything was implemented into the game due to important personal stuff coming up that required me to take a break from the project. It was fun making this game and I learned a lot from it. Special thanks to @ThisIsEllian(Twitter) for making the devtober tweet. I know the thanks isn't needed but if I didn't see it the game wouldn't exist and I would have learned nothing this month haha.
